column8: Hierarchical relationship of new component to context object. 1=the first level of archival objects, 2=second level, 3=third level, etc.  1 would indicate a sibling of the selected Arch. Obj (or the top level Arch. Obj. in a Resource that does not have any); 2 indicates a child, etc.

column88: Digital Object Identifier (Leave this blank to get a default system-assigned Digital Object Identifier that is based on the Archival Object Ref ID. Or enter a custom identifier here to override the default. Custom identifier must be unique within ArchivesSpace.  Note that Digital Object Identifiers are not exported in the EAD.)

column90: Publish Digital Object (FALSE/TRUE)  (Note that Publish value will be inherited by each File Version in addition to being set on the Digital Object record. Leave this blank to get the default value FALSE.)

column171: PRELIMINARY NOTES TO AFFIDAVITS: The affidavits in this box presumably relate to the defense of the accused organizations. For classification as to which were exhibits, etc., detailed scrutiny of the affidavits together with related portions of the record will of course be required. The majority of these affidavits are signed originals.

column171: PRELIMINARY NOTES TO GESTAPO AFFIDAVITS: There appear to be several series of Gestapo Affidavits. For purpose of this inventory, they have been grouped according to differences in identification. This arbitrary division should not be considered as a final one.
